section.ja: 大学院統合生命科学研究科
Graduate School of Integrated Sciences for Life

degree_institution.ja: 北海道大学大学院　農学研究科　博士課程前期

profile.ja: 日本を含む東アジア・東南アジアの農漁業資源の持続的な利用と管理に研究を行う一方、水産物・食料貿易に関する調査をしている。グローバル化が進む食料産業の実態を踏まえ、食の安全確保のために必要な社会システムについて、フードチェーン・アプローチの視点から教育研究を行っている。学部・大学院では、食料生産管理に関する科目を担当し、地域と連携した人材育成プログラムに関わっている。社会的活動としては、国や県の農漁業関係委員会等に参加するとともに、国際技術協力のプロジェクト評価等にも積極的に関わっている。
profile.en: My research topics are concerned about coastal resource management in Southeast Asia, and fisheries and food trade. I am responsible for the curriculum course of food production management at the Faculty and the Graduate School. Recent special topics are to identify how to achieve food safety in the globalization of food industry. I attend consultant and council meetings as an expert, at national and provincial levels. My special task is to evaluate the technical cooperation projects implemented in developing countries.

東南アジアの漁民組織、水産開発等に関する研究を評価。

paper_title.ja: タイの GAP 普及支援システムに関する研究 ―南部のエビ養殖産地を事例に―
paper_title.en: Extension and Supporting System of GAP in Thai Shrimp Aquaculture: Through a Case Study in the South

description.en: This paper purposes to identify a workable mechanism of decentralized procedures on a national standard of shrimp production, and analyze how processing companies and shrimp farms adopt it. Coastal aquaculture in Thailand has developed as an export-oriented industry, which is required to adopt adequate food chain approaches. A process confirmation method such as Good Aquaculture Practices (GAP) is recommended to shrimp farms. As a national standard, GAP has been widely extended. Department of Fisheries plays as a de facto scheme owner, and related agencies are assigned as certification body and inspection body. A provincial fisheries office works for extension and issuing any needed documents of GAP. A provincial research agency monitors and audit shrimp farms. Such a decentralized mechanism has worked effectively.

paper_title.ja: 水産加工業にみるフードチェーン・アプローチ －瀬戸内海沿岸の加工企業の事例分析―
paper_title.en: Food Chain Approach Adopted by Fish Processing Industry - Case Studies on Processing Companies in Coastal Area of the Seto Island Sea

description.en: The purpose of this study is to focus on how the fish processing industry located in coastal areas of the Set Island Sea have adopted the food chain approach. The division of labor has been a widespread phenomenon in the food manufacturing industry, and hence controlling food safety on the flow “farm to table” has become a global concern. Fish processing companies have adopted process conformity rather than product conformity in their plants, with Hazard Analysis and Critical Control Points, and other adequate methods. Case studies on three fish processing companies were conducted as regards how they introduced and developed the food chain approach. This study concluded that these companies have successfully attained the process conformity, but their suppliers of raw materials have not yet achieved except for one company. It is necessary to consider how to extend the food chain approach to producers and primary level processers.

paper_title.ja: 北海道のサケマスふ化放流事業を支える条件 ―北見管内の増殖事業を事例に―
paper_title.en: Conditions on Supporting Enhancement Activities of Salmon and Trout in Hokkaido: A Case Study on Kitami Salmon Enhancement Program Association

description.en:
Under the hatchery stock enhancement program of Hokkaido, enhancement activities are a key aspect of commercial salmon fisheries in Hokkaido. Regional salmon enhancement program associations play a vital role of producing and releasing hatchery-reared fish, in collaboration with large-scale set net fisheries
enterprises, fisheries cooperatives, and local governments. This paper was to analyze socioeconomic conditions that develop salmon enhancement programs in Kitami region. Kitami Salmon Enhancement Program Association （KSEPA） relocated hatcheries facilities in terms of economic efficiency, and made efforts to technological improvement for the rate of salmon returning. An increasing turnover of salmon fisheries bought the financial stability of KSEPA, thus enabling the sustainability of salmon fisheries.

paper_title.ja: 東アジアの水産物貿易

description.en: This paper was to identify the distinctiveness of the fisheries foreign trade in East Asia. Dynamic changes were observed. Systematization and required-standards were also discussed, to secure food safety.
description.ja: 東アジアの水産物貿易の特徴を、各国間の分業関係の進展という視点からとらえ、そのダイナミックな動きを分析した。これに伴って進む、生産から流通・加工に至るシステム化の動きを明らかにした。

description.ja: 東日本大震災によって水産業が壊滅的な打撃を受けた岩手県のサケ産業の経済状況を分析し、今後の地域漁業のあり方を論じた。

description.en: Seaweed farming has been done by fishermen for many years and contributing to the local economy. This paper aims to analyze the sustainable coastal livelihoods in a coastal community in Indonesia.

paper_title.en: Perception of Food Inspectors and Traders on Trans-boundary Food Control Measures of Myanmar
paper_title.ja: Perception of Food Inspectors and Traders on Trans-boundary Food Control Measures of Myanmar

description.en: Food control can be considered the assurance system for trade facilitation in exports and the line of defense for protecting consumer in imports. The food export trading sector in developing countries could benefit, if it can fulfill the requirements of foreign markets; meanwhile domestic consumers can enjoy more choices from healthy market competition. Thus, the developing, agricultural exporting country Myanmar should pay attention on the development of food control system by means of vertical integration to reap the benefits conferred by international food trade.

book_title.ja: 東南アジア、日本の水産技術協力

description.ja: 日本の東南アジア開発途上地域に対する水産技術協力の成果と課題を実態調査をもとに、成果と課題を明らかにした。水産分野の技術協力のあり方、持続的な沿岸水産資源の利用と保全をはかるための管理体制、貧困地域における内水面養殖の普及手法のあり方、地方分権的な沿岸域管理のあり方、等について検討した。

book_owner_range.ja: グローバル化する水産業と東アジア水産物貿易

book_title.ja: 私たちの「食の安全・安心」と環境問題－身近な地域の食料と環境を考える－
日本の漁村・水産業の多面的機能
開発と協同組合－タイにおける農漁村協同組合の発展

description.ja:
アジア開発途上国の農漁村開発において，協同組合はいかなる役割を果たすことができるのか。貧困の解消と生産力の拡大を目標に農漁村開発を進めてきた途上国では，長年にわたってこの問いかけがなされてきた。環境への配慮を欠き，人間の基本的生活の快適さを無視した従来型の農漁業開発に対する反省が求められるなか，改めて協同組合的アプローチの有効性が注目されている。
 協同組合運動が培ってきた協同と民主主義の理念は，人間の基本的生活に視点を据えた参加型開発に不可欠な要素である。だが，途上国の協同組合運動の将来展望は，いまだに悲観主義と楽観主義の間を揺れ動き，政治主義と開発主義が交錯している。
 本書は，タイの農漁村協同組合運動の発展の軌跡を分析し，協同組合運動が抱えてきたジレンマを解き明かし，今どのような発展方向を目指すべきなのかを検討している。途上国型の協同組合運動を再評価し，発展への道筋を提起した画期的な書である。アジアの農漁村開発に関わる全ての人々に読んでいただきたい。
